summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FlexCard image upload and QR code features. All features working correctly: avatar upload, cover image upload, images display on public profile, QR code is always black (no color picker), and profile picture/name are centered on public profile.
passed_tests: API health check - FlexCard API responding correctly
Authentication with session token works
Avatar upload via /api/upload/avatar - returns /api/uploads/ path
Avatar image accessible via /api/uploads/{filename}
Cover upload via /api/upload/cover - returns /api/uploads/ path
Cover image accessible via /api/uploads/{filename}
Profile avatar field updated after upload
Profile cover_image and cover_type fields updated after upload
Avatar delete functionality works
Cover delete functionality works
Legacy paths (/uploads/) handled correctly - images accessible via /api/uploads/
Public profile /u/jihemekacou displays avatar correctly
Public profile /u/kounapster displays cover image correctly
Public profile displays first_name and last_name
Dashboard loads with all navigation tabs
QR Code tab displays black QR code (#000000)
No color picker present in QR Code tab
QR Code download button works
Ma carte tab shows avatar upload option (Changer button)
Ma carte tab shows cover options (Couleur/Image radio buttons)
Cover image upload dropzone appears when Image is selected
Public profile avatar is centered (left-1/2 translate-x-1/2)
Public profile name is centered (text-center class)
Public profile displays all info correctly (title, company, location, bio)
seed_data_creation: Created test user with profile for image upload testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Image upload functionality fully working. Images are served via /api/uploads/ path. Legacy paths (/uploads/) are handled by frontend by prepending /api. QR code is always black with no color picker. Existing test profiles: jihemekacou (has avatar), kounapster (has avatar + cover image).
